name: indifcom
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: 3eqtr4i(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cin(c1, c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)))
-| wceq(cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cin(c1, c0), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)), cdif(cin(c1, c0), c2))

|- wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)))

-| wceq(cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)), cdif(cin(c1, c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cin(c1, c0), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)), cdif(cin(c1, c0), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))

|- wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cin(c1, cdif(c0, c2)), cdif(cin(c1, c0), c2))

body.origin: |- wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2))

comment: Commutation law for intersection and difference. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Feb-2013.)
